body:
## How does it work?

### Subscribing

If you want to get email updates for a hashtag or user mention, simply send an email to 
subscribe@twailer.mstaessen.be with the hashtag (including #) or user mention (including @) in the subject
field. If the subscription was successful, you will receive a confirmation email.

### Unsubscribing

If you no longer want to receive email updates, you can unsubscribe in a similar fasion:
send an email to unsubscribe@twailer.mstaessen.be. You can leave the subject line empty if you want to cancel all of your subscriptions or you can specify which hashtag or user mention you want to unfollow.
